IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDES RESEARCH, PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT, AND EDUCATION FOR PROFESSIONALS IN MANUFACTURING.
IRS990.MissionDesc: MAPI IS A NONPROFIT PROFESSIONAL SOCIETY SUPPORTING MANUFACTURING LEADERS. PROVIDES EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES FOR SENIOR-LEVEL MANUFACTURING EXECUTIVES TO EXCHANGE KNOWLEDGE AND BUILD EXPERTISE AND BETTER MANAGEMENT PRACTICES.
IRS990.Desc: EXECUTIVE EDUCATION:THROUGH ITS 22 EXECUTIVE COUNCILS, MAPI PROVIDES MEMBER-LED BEST PRACTICE CASE STUDIES, BENCHMARKING, AND NETWORKING OPPORTUNITIES FOR SENIOR-LEVEL EXECUTIVES WITHIN TWO DOZEN AREAS OF MANUFACTURING MANAGEMENT. ITS PRIMARY PROGRAMS IN THIS AREA INCLUDE CONFERENCES, SURVEYS, EDUCATIONAL WEBINARS, AND RESEARCH STUDIES.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: RESEARCH AND PUBLISHING:MAPI PRODUCES BUSINESS AND POLICY RESEARCH ON TOPICS OF GREATEST INTEREST TO MANUFACTURING COMPANIES AND THEIR SENIOR LEADERS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: WEBSITE AND COMMUNICATION:MAPI EXPERTS ADDRESS MEMBERS' SENIOR MANAGEMENT TEAMS, CONFERENCES, AND WORKSHOPS THROUGHOUT THE YEAR. THE COUNCIL DIRECTORS RESPOND TO MEMBER MANAGEMENT REQUESTS FOR BUSINESS INFORMATION, AND EACH COUNCIL PROVIDES ELECTRONIC INFORMATION-SHARING NETWORKS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MAPI IS EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAX UNDER SECTION 501(C)(6) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE ("IRC"). MANAGEMENT HAS CONCLUDED THAT THE ENTITY HAS MAINTAINED ITS EXEMPT TAX STATUS AND THAT THERE ARE NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS AS OF JUNE 30, 2022 AND 2021.
STEPHEN V. GOLD, PRESIDENT AND CEO, PARTICIPATED IN A 457(F) NONQUALIFIIED RETIREMENT PLAN. NO DISBURSEMENTS WERE MADE IN THE CURRENT YEAR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 1A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD DELEGATED BROAD AUTHORITY TO THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE WHO THEN RECEIVES AFFIRMATION FROM THE FULL BOARD AS REQUIRED BY GOVERNING DOCUMENTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MEMBERSHIP IN THE CORPORATION SHALL BE LIMITED TO MEMBER COMPANIES. ANY PERSONS, CORPORATIONS, FIRMS, PARTNERSHIPS, OR OTHER ENTITIES ENGAGED IN MANUFACTURING AND RELATED BUSINESS SERVICES WITHIN THE INDUSTRY SHALL BE ELIGIBLE FOR MEMBERSHIP IN THE CORPORATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE TRUSTEES SHALL BE ELECTED AT THE ANNUAL MEETING EACH YEAR. THE BOARD SHALL BE SELECTED FROM AMONG TOP-LEVEL EXECUTIVES OF MEMBER COMPANIES, PROVIDED THAT NO MORE THAN ONE TRUSTEE SHALL BE SELECTED FROM ANY MEMBER COMPANY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A COPY OF THE FORM 990 WAS SUBMITTED TO THE PRESIDENT AND CEO, CHAIRMAN, AND VICE CHAIRMAN PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ANNUALLY, ALL EMPLOYEES SIGN A CODE OF CONDUCT POLICY WHICH REQUIRES EMPLOYEES TO NOTIFY MAPI IF THERE IS AN ACTUAL OR POTENTIAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST. SIMILARLY, THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING BODY, THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE OF THE MAPI BOARD OF TRUSTEES, MUST ALL SIGN A CONFLICT OF INTEREST NOTICE REQUIRING THEM TO NOTIFY THE ORGANIZATION OF POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST, AS WELL AS TO RECUSE THEMSELVES FROM ANY DISCUSSION OR VOTE IN WHICH THEY, OR THEIR IMMEDIATE FAMILY MEMBERS OR THERE COMPANIES, MAY HAVE AN INTEREST. MANAGEMENT AND THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE MONITOR ACTIVITES FOR COI THROUGH APPROPRIATE TRANSACTIONAL REVIEW AND IF A TRANSACTION OCCURS WHICH RAISES THE ISSUE OF A CONFLICT OF INTEREST, THE PROCEDURE IS TO NOTIFY MAPI'S GENERAL COUNSEL AND CEO WHO WILL INVESTIGATE THE POTENTIAL CONFLICT. IF THE CONFLICT CAN BE FULLY RESOLVED QUICKLY, THE MATTER WILL BE RESOLVED AND DOCUMENTED. IF THE MATTER IS MORE COMPLEX OR REQUIRES ADDITIONAL INVESTIGATION, THE CEO WILL HIRE AN OUTSIDE PARTY TO COMPLETE AN INVESTIGATION, AND RECOMMEND A RESOLUTION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE COMPENSATION OF THE PRESIDENT AND CEO AND OF THE VICE-PRESIDENT OFFICERS ARE REVIEWED AND APPROVED BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE ON AN ANNUAL BASIS. THE ORGANIZATION PERIODICALLY ENGAGES AN INDEPENDENT PROFESSIONAL REVIEW OF COMPENSATION, MOST RECENTLY IN 2021. IN THE INTERIM, COMPENSATION OF KEY EMPLOYEES IS DETERMINED BY THE CEO AND REVIEWED BY HR USING SALARY SURVEYS AND OTHER MARKET DATA.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: MAPI'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, POLICIES, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC UPON REQUEST BASED ON MANAGEMENT'S APPROVAL.
ACCUMULATED PENSION ADJUSTMENT 423,501. NET PERIODIC PENSION COST -95,412.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: ADVANCEMENT OF TECHNOLOGY AND PRODUCTIVITY IN THE MANUFACTURING INDUSTRY
